snippet: Video shot on Wednesday in Cairo, of an Islamist man clapping his hand over the mouth of a veteran female activist, seemed to encapsulate the worst fears of secular Egyptians.
abstract: Video shot on Wednesday in Cairo, of an Islamist man clapping his hand over the mouth of a veteran female activist, seemed to encapsulate the worst fears of secular Egyptians.

headline.main: Clash of Cultures Within Egypt Made Visible in Single Frame of Video

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
